mapper.select: /* 권한별 메뉴화면 사용권한 조회 */ SELECT A.RGHT_CD , A.RGHT_CD_NM , A.RGHT_CD_EXPL , A.RGHT_CCD , B.MENU_ID , B.SQ , B.MDFY_RGHT_CCD , B.HNDL_DY_TM , B.HNDL_DPRT_CD , B.HNDL_P_ENO FROM RAA94B A LEFT JOIN (SELECT B.RGHT_CD , B.SQ , B.MENU_ID , B.MDFY_RGHT_CCD , B.HNDL_DY_TM , B.HNDL_DPRT_CD , B.HNDL_P_ENO FROM RAA93B A RIGHT JOIN RAA95B B ON A.MENU_ID = B.MENU_ID) B ON A.RGHT_CD = B.RGHT_CD
